name: maximus
description: Multi-provider LLM gateway with terminal-style UI
author: morissonmaciel

scripts.start-container: concurrently "GATEWAY_PORT=3001 npm run gateway" "WEB_PORT=3000 GATEWAY_PORT=3001 GATEWAY_PUBLIC_PORT=30001 npm run web"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gateway && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
